title: The Jewel in the Crown. V.2. a Secret Vow
brief_description: Daphne Manners has fled to Kashmir carrying the half-caste child of Hari Kumar and hoping to bear his child in peace. But the unjust imprisonment of Hari Kumar haunts Daphne until Sarah Layton reveals the secrets that could ruin Lieutenant Merrick and free Hari Kumar.
